name: Go Fast Annie
description:
On the Menu PRESS 2 to start.

Created for Week Sauce (September 2022) 

This month's (optional) theme is: Explain a movie you like badly in a sentence or two, base your game on that

I went for "Commuter has licence revoked but still gets to drive"

So the game is codenamed Wildcat but the title is Go Fast Annie, named after Sandra Bullock's character in the film speed, who has to drive the bus as the driver is unable to do so.

Signs made with https://dki-os.github.io/SignMaker/
